item.title: Gandhi opera Satyagraha returns to London
item.author: Anmol Patel,
item.description: This year brings with it the highly anticipated third revival of Philip Glass’s iconic Satyagraha, an epic opera based on Mahatma Gandhi’s memoir My Experiments with Truth.
